EmailTemplate.name: Appliance-Nurture0.Email
EmailTemplate.subject: Your VMTurbo Download: What Now?
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Own Your Environment. Dear {{lead.First Name:default=Sir/Madam}},
Congratulations! You're a genius. You've just downloaded the world's most advanced virtualization management software, the VMTurbo Operations Manager. You're on your way to ramping up VM density and achieving previously impossible utilization rates, all while assuring application performance like never before.
- Start by deploying the self-contained instance. Your username and password is "administrator". Our Installation video will usher you straight to the promised land:
<http://youtu.be/pnMvx_E99oc>
- Snag your License Key below, or as we like to call it, the “Life before VMTurbo was so much worse” key.
<http://bit.ly/1o95lOP>
Life is about the change. CAPEX and OPEX are going down, along with your frustrations. Like we said, you’re a genius. It’s time to own your environment. Looking forward to your success, VMTurbo
Need help? Contact Sales at (877) 978 8818.
